title: Fiery Climb, Spanish Sun Serve Up Early GC Chaos in Vuelta a España
content:
The heat is on after first summit finish leaves Vuelta GC scrambled and unpredictable: 'Roglič knows what he’s doing, he’s following the same playbook.'

Read the full article at Fiery Climb, Spanish Sun Serve Up Early GC Chaos in Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: ahood
